title: Austria at the 1904 Summer Olympics
text:
<a href="Cisleithania">Austria</a> competed at the <a href="1904%20Summer%20Olympics">1904 Summer Olympics</a> in <a href="St.%20Louis%2C%20Missouri">St. Louis</a>, <a href="United%20States">United States</a>. Austrian and Hungarian results at early Olympic Games are generally kept separate despite the union of the two nations as <a href="Austria-Hungary">Austria-Hungary</a> at the time.
Austrian gymnast <a href="Julius%20Lenhart">Julius Lenhart</a>, lived in America and represented Philadelphia-based club, won two gold medals and one silver medal, making him the most successful Austrian competitor ever at the Summer Olympic Games.
